title: Data Tagging

parameters.label: organization-defined elements of personally identifiable information

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Attach data tags containing the following purposes to {{ pt-3.1_prm_1 }}: {{ pt-3.1_prm_2 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Data tags support the tracking of processing purposes by conveying the purposes along with the relevant elements of personally identifiable information throughout the system. By conveying the processing purposes in a data tag along with the personally identifiable information as the information transits a system, a system owner or operator can identify whether a change in processing would be compatible with the identified and documented purposes. Data tags may also support the use of automated tools.

group_title: Personally Identifiable Information Processing and Transparency
